name: 信念之巫女
Unwavering Auspex
description: 通关“泽娜的试炼 绝级”。
Clear the quest 'Zena's Trial: Legend'

name: 闪火之巫女
Blazing Auspex
description: 通关“席菈的试炼 绝级”。
Clear the quest 'Sheila's Trial: Legend'
description3

name: 烈风之巫女
Talented Auspex
description: 通关“伊莉雅的试炼 绝级”。
Clear the quest 'Ilia's Trial: Legend'
description3

name: 圣辉之巫女
Radiant Auspex
description: 通关“塞西娅的试炼 绝级”。
Clear the quest 'Zethia's Trial: Legend'
description3

name: 狱水之巫女
Aqueous Auspex
description: 通关“奥莉加的试炼 绝级”。
Clear the quest 'Origa's Trial: Legend'
description3

name: 新的开始
A New Beginning
description: 累计通关任意关卡5次。
Clear any quest 5 times in total.
description3

name: 新手玩家
Rookie Player
description: 使用3名角色通关任意关卡。
Clear any quest with 3 different adventurers.
description3

name: “一炮走红”
One-hit Wonder
description: 满血状态下受到一次伤害大于3000的攻击并直接死亡
Defeated instantly at full HP by a single attack dealing more than 3000 damage.
description3

name: 准备不足
Unprepared
description: 进入任务后5秒以内放弃任务。
Quit a quest in five seconds.
description3

name: 火力全开
Some Like It Hot
description: 在“席菈的试炼 绝级”中，累计身处“劫火”或“烧伤”状态180秒并不使用任何复活通关。
Clear 'Sheila’s Trial: Legend' while being inflicted by “Scorchrend” or “Burn” for a total of 180 seconds, without using any revive.
description3

name: 皓月之下
Under the Bright Moon
description: 在“泽娜的试炼 绝级”中，在没有“铁壁”状态的情况下承受泽娜的“创世圣冠”攻击5次后通关。
Clear 'Zena's Trial: Legend', and withstand Zena's 'Genesis Moonbeam' attack 5 times without the 'Invincible' effect in the quest.
description3

name: 直奔主题
Cut to the Chase
description: 不击败塞西娅的情况下，通关“伊莉雅的试炼 超级”。
Clear 'Ilia’s Trial: Master' without defeating Zethia.
description3

name: 速通玩家
Speed Run
description: 在“塞西娅的试炼 超级”中，在塞西娅使用“慈爱之环”之前过关。
Clear 'Zethia’s Trial: Master' before she using skill 'Ring of Affection'.
description3
